categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Human male Jedi served the Jedi Order in the last centuries of the Galactic Republic. He was bone-thin with horribly scarred skin and had unkempt gray hair. At some point, he demonstrated his ability to conjure Force Light to fellow Jedi Beldorion. Many years later, in 13 ABY, Leia Organa Solo witnessed this man in a fragment of the Hutt's memory through the Force.
